data.title: Elias Canetti - Wikipedia
data.meta_description: Elias Canetti - Wikipedia - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. Elias Canetti was a German-language writer born in 1905 in Ruse, Bulgaria to a Sephardic Jewish family. He spent parts of his childhood in Manchester, England and Vienna, Austria before settling permanently in Vienna in 1912. Canetti published several novels and works of non-fiction exploring themes of crowds and power before fleeing Nazi Germany in 1938 to settle in England. He won the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1981. Canetti lived his final years in ZÃ¼rich, Switzerland, where he died in 1994.
